document_data.title: Revenge's Sweet
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Revenge's Sweet''''' is a two-round tournament adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program and the second part of the two-part ''Morgan'' series of modules. It was published in 1994 and is intended for a party of adventurers of any levels.

{{Quote|A year ago the dreaded Captain Morgan was captured after taking the wrong group of adventurers as slaves. He has been rotting in jail for over a year, but there are rumors that Sembia wants him for crimes he has committed in their country. But what does this have to do with you?}}
document_data.Index:
This adventure contains two rounds in two separate documents, which are indexed separately on these subpages:
* [[Revenge's Sweet/Round One|Round One]]
* [[Revenge's Sweet/Round Two|Round Two]]
